programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: Chauncey turns the tables on Derek by buying a tiny house in the middle of nowhere, sight unseen and without consulting him first.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: The team takes on the renovation of a 100-year-old house in hopes of having a showpiece flip as well as a sweet profit; termite damage, outdated electrical systems, and hard-to-match vintage details could turn the showpiece into a public disaster.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: The team finds a midcentury house that has its share of zombie features, but also some vintage touches that Ashlee thinks can be restored; when Keith insists that everything be updated, it becomes a battle of classic-retro versus modern upgrades.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: The zombie flippers uncover a flag lot property -- a house tucked behind another with a narrow access; there's a property line dispute with the neighbor, but the lakefront location and low price are too tantalizing to pass up.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: Dolmar gets a great deal on a zombie in the up-and-coming Spring Hill neighborhood, but after a series of mistakes and expensive renovations this money maker quickly starts to look more like a money pit.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: The team faces a house with flea-infested carpets and a putrid smell, but when the neighbors pitch in to help, the team gets excited to turn the house into a home.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: A married couple gets divorced in the middle of a home renovation, giving the flippers an opportunity they cannot turn down; the team soon learns that taking on someone else's flip also comes with someone else's problems.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: This lakefront neighborhood zombie seems like a great deal, with its massive swimming pool, vintage original floors, plus the potential to bring in a six figure profit.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: Flipping experts Chauncey Pham and her husband, Derek, tackle a house in the hot Casa Linda neighborhood; with unexpected construction issues and Chauncey insisting on a unique design POV, they attempt to keep their timeline and budget in check.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: Derek and Chauncey buy an ugly, bug-infested zombie in Casa Linda, and they have high hopes of turning it around in only 30 days; the Dream Team encounters plumbing problems, cabinet calamities, and an actual burglary.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: Derek gets a new property for $.50 on the dollar, which makes him confident that nothing could possibly go wrong; the flippers face the worst rat and roach infestation in their careers.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: Chauncey and Derek take on a partner in their latest zombie renovation; as the three investors pool their money and resources in hopes of flipping this house on budget and on time, this 60-year-old home has other plans.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
